General.Name: Wuhan Xianglong Power Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuhan Xianglong Power Industry Co.Ltd engages in the water supply and construction businesses in China. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.
